name: Commando Sniper Counter Strike
summary:
Become a commando sniper in counter strike mission game as a frontline hero. This counter terror as commando mission game 2017 take you to the front of the modern war to face the enemy crazy sniper and assault soldiers. This is a great FPS terror battle game. In counter strike games with mission! Show no mercy on any enemies standing in front of you! Unlock all the terrorism shoot weapons, and win the final terror attack victory of this war game. The FPS criminal shoot game with plenty of weapons in the terrorist war with counter terrorist strategy game. You have to kill the crazy enemy with your terrorism shoot gun as a sniper commando assassin. Play as the elite sniper with your MP4 commando assassin gun in Commando Sniper Counter Strike. 
 
Dagger battle game with counter terrorism is all about commando games 3d 2017. You are playing as the last commando of the city and you have advanced weapons to tear up the enemy's commando. You have to attack frequently in this terror war with non-stop to killing of the enemy. Be vigilant in this sniper shoot and commando assassin game. Super FPS (first person shooting) action game for the lovers of commando games 3d 2017 as a commando city sniper. Ultimate counter terrorism shooting and dynamic sniper combat action in counter strike mission game. Complete all professional sniper missions to unlock all commando weapons in sniper assassin 2017. 
 
As a commando shooter, play with courage by facing countless enemies. You have to destroy the enemy and finish the terrorists killing missions. Frontline war has just begun and you have to clear the area and safe the all hostages. Battle your way into the heart of enemy’s territory. Utilize special war gear on the battlefield with counter strike games 2017. 
 
Features of Commando Sniper Counter Strike: 
 
✓ Multiple weapons to strike like AK47, M9, shot gun and rifle. 
✓ Brave assassin commando complete mission and target. 
✓ Best shooting game with real front line fighting. 
✓ Upgrade your gun from a wide range of assault weapons. 
✓ High quality 3D graphic with thrilling sounds in commando sniper adventure. 
✓ 15 extreme terrorist shooting killer and classic dagger battle missions. 
 
Get ready for the aim is to shoot and eliminate kidnappers & terrorist border shooting showdown. You have to take a risk of fighting missions, take up your sniping position, aim down the sniper scope, and fire as commando shooter. Download now Commando Sniper Counter Strike and enter into the world of counter strike games.
